about_the_game:
Metagroove is a very unique 3d visualization tool for music.
This first version is Alpha and it's a work in progress.

Load your own music, add some parameters. Import your own custom 3d models or free models you find on the internet. Add background images, type your own text and watch what happens! Apply different animation and spawning parameters to see things move around.

Useful for crypto artists, DJ's, streaming (starts, pauses, endings), memes, experiments, logos, visualizations, and more

Features!

Easy to use
Works with audio streaming sources
Import MP3's and .WAV's
Import your own models or free models from the web, supports DAE, FBX, OBJ, STL, 3DS
A large amount of built in 3d models
Easily create stunning visuals for video or desktop wallpapers in a fraction of the time it takes to learn complex 3d programs
Create your own memes
Add weather, such as rain, clouds, snow
Add lighting effects
Add your own text or logos

The music included is by Evan Gipson and Tineidae!
detailed_description:
Metagroove is a very unique 3d visualization tool for music.
This first version is Alpha and it's a work in progress.

Load your own music, add some parameters. Import your own custom 3d models or free models you find on the internet. Add background images, type your own text and watch what happens! Apply different animation and spawning parameters to see things move around.

Useful for crypto artists, DJ's, streaming (starts, pauses, endings), memes, experiments, logos, visualizations, and more

Import MP3's and .WAV's
Import your own models or free models from the web, supports DAE, FBX, OBJ, STL, 3DS
A large amount of built in 3d models
Easily create stunning visuals for video or desktop wallpapers in a fraction of the time it takes to learn complex 3d programs
Create your own memes

The music included is by Evan Gipson and Tineidae!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14
  • Processor: intel i7
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560X
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

name: Metagroove

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Blaster

short_description: Metagroove lets you create visual music experiments, make memes or random visual nonsense!
